title: Different firefox account in different containers
content: Is it possible to have different firefox accounts, hence different bookmarks, passwords, ... on different containers?
creator: nicola.buso

title: Cambio en la configuración de las descargas: QUIERO REVERTIR
content: Con la actualización 98.0 habéis cambiado la configuración de las descargas. Ahora, automáticamente y por defecto, me guarda en la carpeta "Descargas" todos los documentos que he abierto desde Firefox. Esto no tiene ningún sentido: en la mayoría de las ocasiones solo quiero abrir o visualizar un archivo, y no guardarlo en mi equipo. Antes me dejaba escoger si quería abrirlo o guardarlo, pero ahora, aunque me sigue ofreciendo esta opción, SIEMPRE lo gaurda. Y así se guardan un montón de archivos en mi ordenador que no quiero conserva y tengo que ir buscando y borrando. ¿¿¿CÓMO PUEDO QUITAR ESTO??? Solo quiero guardar los archivos que quiero guardar, no todos, por defecto. NO ENTIENDO QUÉ CLASE DE MEJORA ES ESTA.
creator: carteia

title: FireFox feature requests
content:
Add an option to load presets for Firefox settings. I have poor eye site. In order to read the text I am writing I have the zoom set to 170. Add to that the size and color of the icons it is difficult to tell what the icons represent. by a preset I mean when first installed give options to set toolbar height and width, select the color used or simply select black and white. Colors are pretty and icons look cool but are useless until you know what they represent. 

 This support page is black and white. Other than the fact that many of your users will need to set a high zoom it looks pretty good.
creator: michael_lickley

title: Impossibile avviare Firefox su Mac OS 10.15.7
content: Gentilissimi, da un paio di mesi, non è possibile lanciare Firefox sul mio Mac con OS in oggetto. Mi viene restituirto l'errore "impossibile avviare firefox". Nei vari forum che ho consultato ho trovato questa stringa: /Applications/Firefox.app/Contents/MacOS/firefox-bin -P con cui riesco ad avviarlo da terminale. Scelgo il profilo e tutto funziona perfettamente. Ma se spengo la macchina lo devo riavviare con questa procedura. Ho già provato a disinstallare e installare la versione più recente ma nulla da fare. L'ultimo step che mi rimane è formattare. Qualcuno mi dà un aiuto. Grazie. Giovanni
creator: nontrovonomi65

title: How to get Content Types Back in Applications
content:
Many file types are no longer listed under Settings > Applications>Content Type at about:preferences#general. I used to be able to click on a file in an email like a Word or Excel document, and it would come up on my screen. Now Firefox asks me to Save them. I don't want to automatically save files without first looking at them. How can I get those file types in the Application list again?

I have attached a pic of the file types I have left to chose from. There used to be a lot more. How can I get back all the missing choices I have had there for years?
creator: mishasarkpetsitting

Both my laptop and desk top computers will not allow me access to either of these sites. I'm about to be finished with Firefox. This is not the first time this has happened and I don't know the what the gentleman did the last time to fix it. I'm very frustrated. I need help and no where are there clear and easy directions on how to fix this.
creator: KaronM

title: content type action not working
content:
I'm using Firefox version 98.0.2 on Windows 10. As of 3 days ago, probably after a Firefox update, clicking on a .CSV link stopped working. It either automatically saves to Downloads, or asks me where to save depending on the Files and Applications > Downloads setting. It no longer opens the file automatically with Excel. I've restarted in Troubleshooting mode, and did a Firefox reset. I've confirmed that the Content Type, Action is set to "Microsoft Excel Comma Separated Variables File --> Use Excel (default)".

Out of ideas. How can I fix this?
creator: MarkFoley
